segments.text: I see the kitchen layout with the sink on the right and cabinets left.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands drying a plate, her apron tied neatly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows steadily from the faucet, filling and spilling over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, with the puddle forming at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy climbs the stool toward the open cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It tilts slightly, but he steadies himself to reach inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate too, maybe to keep cookies from falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby raises her arm, palm up for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They work together quietly while the woman focuses elsewhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden through the window is neat with bushes and a path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how the hazards go unnoticed in such a calm space.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water sheet pouring down is almost mesmerizing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long this has been going on without anyone reacting.
segments.speaker: PAR
